resources.string: "This won't be visible for the user:"

"You can choose how much functionality you want to see in your phone. If you are new to smart phones in general, you can start at the first level, where you will have minimal functionality, so it will be easier to use. When you feel comfortable, you can change the level up. Of course you can start with maximum level as well. "

(When checked, the more you use the phone, the more features will be enabled . This way learning to use the phone is much easier, since you donâ€™t need to learn everything at once, but step by step.)
